snippet: Hearty fare on Houston Street; a French brasserie on the Upper West Side; Italian-Mexican on the Bowery and more.
abstract: Restaurants Boulton & Watt, Cafe Tallulah, Casa Havana, Circolo, Copper Room, The General, Mighty Quinn's Barbeque and Qi Thai Grill open in New York.
lead_paragraph: Hearty fare on Houston Street; a French brasserie on the Upper West Side; Italian-Mexican on the Bowery and more.

headline.seo: Off the Menu: Hearty Fare on Houston Street; Italian-Mexican on the Bowery
